item.title: Emacs For Mac OS
item.description:
This wiki page is continuously updated with information about how to install, run and config Emacs for Mac OS X.

It has some interesting information about: - Handle encoding problems in Terminal; - Some key binding tips; - Enable / Disable anti-alias;
